summary: More Bandit Encampments Falkreath adds 12 new locations to Falkreath Hold.
descriptionHtml:
More Bandit Encampments Falkreath adds new Locations to give the game more content.

[b][u][color=#9fc5e8]FEATURES[/color][/u][/b]
12 new locations
6 new dungeons
new Deserter Faction
[b][u][color=#9fc5e8]
INSTALL[/color][/u][/b]
Unzip MBEVAN.zip into your Skyrim data folder.

Follow me on Twitter [url=https://twitter.com/DankFrenchToast]@DankFrenchToast[/url]
